abstract: An environment value that indicates whether the current device supports device discovery.
overview:
## Overview

Access the action using the `.devicePickerSupports` key. Then call it as a function, passing the same browse descriptor and parameters you use to search for devices.

items.description: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current device supports device discovery.
items.name: callAsFunction(_:parameters:)

items.description: Display a view in your tvOS app that lists available iOS, iPadOS, and watchOS devices that the user can connect to over their local network.
